dublin_core.dcvalue: The NetHope Solutions Center is a space where NGOs and like minded organizations can find Cloud and ICT solutions to a full range of business problems and program challenges NetHope helps its member organizations collaborate innovate and leverage the full potential of information and communications technology to support their causes
